msbt.message: Do you mean it, darling? The both of us living here?!Why, this island won't know what hit it, !Of course, I'll need to check with Resident Services to make sure I'm welcome, but otherwise I'm IN!

I turned you down, yet you're still so keen to have me move here!I confess, it feels good to feel truly wanted on this island. A little ego boost goes a long way. Very well, let me check with Resident Services. I'll move here if they give me the go-ahead, .

Aren't you lovely! Alas, no. I must pass for now. I'm needed back home.You see, I have various projects underway and too many folks who would miss me. I tell you, it's not easy being so popular. You of all people surely know what I mean, .

My! Is that a serious suggestion? Why, never in my wildest dreams did I imagine I'd get such a lovely offer. ButI'm so sorry to have to turn you down. I just can't move.You see, I'm rather fond of my current island, despiteor perhaps because ofits faults.

Pardon? You want little ol' me to move HERE? Why, never in a million years would I have thought Alasno. I have quite the laundry list of things to tend to back on my own island. Of course, I might consider relocating another time. So let's just put a pin in that, shall we?

What a bold suggestion! And I happen to be a fan of bold suggestions, my dear. But to uproot my life? I mean, it's not an easy decision. What to do?I know! I shall be bold myself. And by bold I meanlet's play a little game to decide whether I move. If you win, I shall move here. Simple as that. And there shall be no complaining about the results. It's a rather clever way to make a decision, no? So, what do you say?
Sounds fun!
It's not my thing.

Hahaha. You are quite the comedian, my dear. Pick up and relocate to this island? Very funny indeed. Oh! You're serious, then. Well, I'll start packing this very instant and get moved in right away! I kid, darling. I kid. I mean, it's a lovely offer, but I need a moment to think, you know. Hmm. I am feeling rather daring, so let's play a little game! And if you win this game, I'll move here. The outcome of a fair and square game shall decide my fate, you see. What say you?
Let's do this.
No way!

Oh my. You're quite serious, aren't you? Butwhat to do?! Do I stay? Do I go? This is a more difficult decision than I might have thought. What is my fate to be, darling? Oh! I know! Let's let fate decide for us! Yes, we shall play a little game, and if you win, I'll move here! A rather novel idea, if I do say so myself. It's worth a try, don't you think, ?
Count me in!
No, thanks.
Ah. I see. Well, I suppose living a bold and unconventional life is not for everyone, .
Too risky for you, is it? I understand. Really I do. But if you change your mind, do come chat with me.
Really? You won't even give it a try? Well then, I won't force the issue.
Very good! Very good! In that case, let's get this game underway.
And that means I win! So very sorry about that.
Which means I am the victor, darling. No pouting about the results either.
And so the game ends with me as the winner! Now now, promise me you won't let this upset you.
Thank you much for that bit of fun, my dear.I guess it means I won't be moving at this time. But if you like, let's play again sometime, .
Playing that game with you was more fun than I imagined! Though it means I'm not moving, which IS a bit sad. But I leave with fond memories and, for that, I thank you.
I suppose I won't be movingstill, I can hardly wait to get back and tell everyone what a FAB time we had. They'll be positively green with envy, darling.

That means you win! My goodness! It also means I'll be moving to this island! , it's going to be a wild adventure, I'm sure!Although, first, I really must check in with Resident Services to make sure it's OK for me to move here I'll run over there now to ask. If you could wait here a moment, I'll be right back, .

That means you are the victor! It also means I'll be moving to this island like I promised. A new adventure awaits, darling! When I write a memoir about my life, surely this will be a highlight. Oh dear! I just realized that I must get approval to move here from Resident Services. If you would, just wait here a moment while I make sure I have the official go-ahead, .

Which means you have triumphed! And my fate is sealedI shall move to this island after all. I confess, I'm glad it went this way. I just KNEW I was meant to have a grand adventure, . ThoughhmmI do need to ask Resident Services if this move has their stamp of approval and whatnot. Wait here a spell while I go find out, would you?

Oh my! You're inviting meagain? I suppose I can't really blame you, now can I? But what to do, what to do I know! I shall let fate decide for me, ! What I mean is, we'll play a game. And if you win, I'll move to this charming little island. What say you?
I say let's do it!
I say no, thanks.

Eh, I'm flattered you'd ask me once again to join you on this island. I suppose I am a bit tempted But you know how I like to play hard to get, my dear.So, how about this. Let's play a little game, and if you win, I'll move to this fabulous island of yours. Shall we give it a go, ?
We shall!
We shall not.

Oh I'm not sure what to do here. I didn't think you'd actually try to invite meagain. Desperate, are you? Well, I am flattered. Still, I can't make it too easy on you, now can I? This is what we'll do! We shall play a game—fair and square, of course— and if you win, I'll move here. Oh now, it'll be fun! Just say yes, !
Yes!
I'm gonna say no.
Ah. I see. I guess it wasn't meant to be. C'est la vie.
Oh ho ho! Look who's playing hard to get now! Well played. Well played, indeed! I may not be moving here, but I shall certainly enjoy whatever time we have together, you cheeky thing you.
Oh! Is that so? I guess you're not that desperate to have me here after all. Well, good on you. And thank you for the invitation, nonetheless. It was lovely of you to ask.

Sorry to keep you waiting, my dear! But I checked with Resident Services, and I have bad newsThere isn't room on this island for a new home to be built. They turned down my request to live here!But I have an idea Perhaps I could ask someone living here if they'd give up their place for little ol' me? Perhaps someone is looking for a change, you see. Change is good!
That's a good idea!
I don't think so.
Yes, I suppose that's in poor taste. I'm sorry for even mentioning it. It's just not meant to be this time.

Alrighty then, I'll summon up all my courage and ask someone.Thoughwho do you think would be most likely to get on board with this plan, ? At Resident Services, they said these were the folks who might hear me out on such a request
, is it?
Yep!
No, someone else.
I changed my mind.
I shall go speak to them now, then. HmmI do hope they're up for it. In any case, I can be very convincing.
Not the best choice, eh? That's fine. Who do you have in mind, then?
Oh. I see. As you wish. I'm reluctant to give up, but if I must, I must.

So I had the chat. I shared my hopes, dreams, and love for this island And they agreed to my idea, darling! They were VERY gracious. I think they were ready to try something new anyway. No offense, of course. Anyhoo, I'm a bit sad I can't live here with them. But the timing is what it is, and I am meant to be here. So get ready, . This is about to be your neighbor!

So, I went to the house, but nobody was there. It would appear they've already moved, if you can believe it! How lucky am I?<10_4 /> Anyhoo, darling, all the i's are dotted and the t's are crossed. That means I can start preparing to move here right awayAnd you, , you can start preparing to make me feel welcome, .
Is something wrong? Is there no one we can turn to?
That's not it.
Yeah, sorry.
Then do please let me know who I should ask.
Ah. I see how it is. Well, I shall hold my head high and move on for now, .
I'm so glad you think so!You know, at Resident Services, they suggested that might cooperate with my plan. Just to be crystal clear though, are you OK with me talking to , ?
I'm totally OK with that!
Actually, please don't.
Ah. I see. Well now. I feel like I've gotten a little ahead of myself.I'm sure you can understand my disappointment. Let's just forget this whole chat about moving, shall we?

Sorry to make you wait, but you'll never believe what has happened.I paid a visit to Resident Services and they told me there's no room for new residents! Imagine my shock! Do they not know who I am? How can they not bend the rules for moi, ? It's a disappointment. But I shall hold out hope that some day we can live on this island together.

Very sorry for the delay. But, darling, I have grave news My dreams of moving here have been dashed. I paid a visit to Resident Services, and they said there are no plots for sale. None at all, ! Is it a zoning issue? Who knows! I didn't want to make a scene, but I'm one unhappy ! Perhaps one day the stars will align, a plot will go up for sale, and we will get to live on the same island.

Sorry for the wait, but I have big news, my dear. I paid a visit to Resident Services, and guess what Go on, guess! Oh, alright. They said, "Welcome to the island!"Oh, , I was on pins and needles the whole time. I nearly fainted when they said I was in. Needless to say, I am over the moon. Thank you for calling little ol' your neighbor.

You know, on second thought, failing to achieve my dream isis well, it is simply unacceptable. Surely there was some sort of confusionat Resident Services.I think I should march right over there and make sure they have their facts straight.
Great idea!
I wouldn't do that.
Oh fine. If you say so. I wouldn't want to be seen as a nuisance.I suppose I'll just have to be patient and hope things change, .

An island so popular they can't even accept new residentsI'm starting to wonder what you're not telling me. Is there some fabulous secret that Resident Services doesn't want me to know, darling? I kid! I kid! But it is vexing not to be allowed to move to this island. I want to be where everyone else wants to be!
It's hard to believe there's no plot of land for sale on your island. Surely one will open up? It's a shame, darling. I have so much to offer a place like this.
Really, darling, this island is something special.I feel like I'm my best when I'm here, you know? Honestly, I'm not sure I want to go home.
What if it WAS home?
Huh, is that so?

Oh my, what a nice thing to say! Living here would be lovely, I'm sure.It's justyou and I hardly know each other. It all feels a bit sudden.ButbutI'm not saying no! I'm merely saying I'd like to visit a few more times to be certain. So do invite me to camp again, .
Yes, it IS so! Haven't you noticed? My complexion is absolutely aglow when I'm here. HmmI MUST find a way to keep this dewy look after I leave, .
You know, everyone on this island has been incredibly nice.Still, I can't help but wonder Would they be so nice to me if I lived here for good?
Move in and find out!
Hmm, I wonder.

Oh my, there IS something to be said for diving right inbut I should get to know the island better first. I feel I need a few more visits, then I'll know for sure. So invite me to camp here again, won't you please? Could I be falling in love with this little island? It just might be, .
Oh dear! But surelythey'd be kind and welcoming in the end?Not to worry, I can be very charming when I want to be, .
